translation: If you are unable to do even this, then, resort to union with Me and renounce the fruits of all actions with self-control.
commentary: 12.11 Then if? This this? Even also? Unable to unable? Asi (thou) art? to do to do? My Yoga My Yoga? dependent resorting to? Sarvakarmaphalatyagam the renunciation of the fruits of all actions? Then then? Kuru do? self-controlled selfcontrolled.Commentary This is the easiest path.
